learn.trustScoreDescription: The key to accessing better terms on the platform
learn.whatIsTrustScoreDescription: Trust Score is our unique measure of your financial reliability based on your actions on the platform and community connections rather than traditional credit checks.
learn.howTrustScoreCalculatedDescription: Your Trust Score is determined by multiple factors related to your activity on the platform:
learn.factorRepaymentDescription: On-time and early repayments increase your score, while late payments or defaults decrease it significantly.
learn.factorCommunityDescription: The number and quality of your connections with trusted community members.
learn.factorConsistencyDescription: Regular positive activity on the platform over time increases your score.
learn.factorLendingDescription: Helping others by lending money increases your standing in the community.
learn.trustScoreBenefitsTitle: Benefits of a High Trust Score
learn.trustScoreBenefit3: Higher visibility of your loan requests
learn.blockchainDescription: How we ensure security and transparency in all transactions
learn.whatIsBlockchainDescription: Blockchain is a secure, transparent digital ledger that records all transactions on our platform in a way that cannot be altered or tampered with, ensuring trust between members.
learn.blockchainFeature1Description: All transactions are cryptographically secured and cannot be altered once recorded.
learn.blockchainFeature2Description: All parties can verify transactions, creating trust without intermediaries.
learn.blockchainFeature3Description: Once recorded, transaction information cannot be changed, ensuring permanent records.
learn.howBlockchainWorksDescription: When you use TrustFund, here's what happens behind the scenes:
learn.blockchainStep1: You initiate a transaction (loan request, funding, or repayment)
learn.blockchainStep2: The transaction is verified by our system
learn.blockchainStep3: Once verified, it's combined with other transactions in a 'block'
learn.blockchainStep4: The block is added to the chain, creating a permanent, unalterable record
learn.faq1Answer: Anyone in supported communities can use TrustFund. You don't need a formal banking history or credit score.
learn.faq2Answer: Initial loan limits are based on your trust score. New users can borrow smaller amounts, with limits increasing as you build your reputation.
learn.faq3Question: What happens if someone doesn't repay a loan?
learn.faq3Answer: Late payments and defaults significantly reduce the borrower's trust score, limiting their future borrowing ability. We also facilitate community-based resolution mechanisms.
learn.faq4Answer: Borrowers propose interest rates when requesting loans. The marketplace helps determine fair rates based on duration, amount, and the borrower's trust score.
learn.faq5Answer: Yes, we use encryption to protect your personal information. Transaction details are stored on the blockchain but personal identifiers are kept secure.
learn.faq6Question: What if I need to extend my loan repayment?
learn.faq6Answer: Contact the lender directly through the platform. Extensions can be arranged with mutual agreement, but may affect your trust score.
learn.stillHaveQuestionsDescription: Visit our Help Center or contact our support team for more information.
